entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
